titles.title: Recognizing and commending American airmen held as prisoners of war at the Buchenwald concentration camp during World War II for their service, bravery, and fortitude.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committee.name: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service

action.text: Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

committee.name: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service

action.text: Committee on Post Office and Civil Service discharged.
Ms. Byrne asked unanimous consent to discharge from committee and consider.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.

committee.name: House Post Office and Civil Service

bill.summary: 4/27/1993--Introduced. Commends the American airmen held as prisoners of war at the Buchenwald concentration camp during World War II.
